comments: She has launched her startup after graduating, and now is capable of hiring new tech talent and coordinates a dev team!
Luis came to the program without any previous experience, He is now a software developer working on a tech firm in Costa Rica.
She came from a different background and is now a successful and talented software developer in Costa Rica.
Rich transitioned from a different background and is now working as a web dev in the tech field.
Got a better 100% increase salary, and now with a new professional life in a career that he is passionate about.
She is now a committed software developer working in a software firm in her home country.
